prompt: Camera zooms in, kitten looks at yarn ball, playing with the yarn ball using its paws.

Camera slowly pushes in from the character looking down, character suddenly lifts head with eyes brightening and brilliant smile, camera rises during the expression change, capturing the moment of looking up, hair illuminated by soft light.

Camera follows a high-speed racing car, during the car's forward motion the camera rotates 180 degrees, moving rapidly from the rear to the front of the car, directly showcasing the full view of the automobile.
A woman dressed as a samurai walks forward holding a lightsaber, then the woman raises and swings the lightsaber, camera rotates to reveal the woman's front view.
A koi fish swimming in a lotus pond, ink painting style.

Three horses galloping forward, knight wearing a white cloak flowing in the wind, camera follows smoothly, focusing on the dynamics of the horse group, background gradually darkens, highlighting the sense of power in running.

Tracking shot, a girl riding a roller coaster, hands tightly gripping the shoulder restraints, nervous yet excited expression, roller coaster ascending, overhead view, background shows the amusement park scenery on the ground, after reaching the peak the roller coaster rapidly plunges down, camera switches to low-angle shot, background is blue sky, girl closes eyes and screams, hair flowing backward rapidly.

Camera with handheld stabilizer closely follows a running character, weaving through narrow alleys, background walls and debris blur rapidly past, creating strong sense of speed and motion, crafting a chase-like visual experience.
